title: The video shows Pakistan Police beating protestors during a rally in Muzaffarabad (PoK)
subtitle: The incident in the video took place at Muzaffarabad in Pakistan occupied Kashmir (PoK). The police in the video are not Uttar Pradesh Police
author: factly.in
vclaim:
A video is being shared widely on social media with a claim that it shows the brutality by the Uttar Pradesh Police on anti-CAA protestors. Let’s try to analyze the claim made in the post. 



Fact: The incident in the video took place at Muzaffarabad in Pakistan occupied Kashmir (PoK). The police in the video are not Uttar Pradesh Police. Hence the claim made in the post is FALSE.

When the screenshots of the video were run through the Yandex Reverse Image Search, the same video was found in the search results. The video uploaded on YouTube has the description that the incident took place in Muzaffarabad (PoK) on 22n October 2019. So, when searched with the relevant keywords, a video by ‘ANI News’ was found in the search results. The video had the following title: “2 killed in police brutality during peaceful protest in PoK’s Muzaffarabad” and similar visuals can be seen in the video. So, the police seen in the video are not UP Police.

To sum it up, the video shows Pakistan Police beating protestors during a rally in Muzaffarabad (PoK).

Did you watch our video on the 10 Most Ridiculous Fake News of the Year 2019?
